Name: Burning Jade
Description: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...
QuestDesc: Maqi is trying to contact you, and it appears to be related to the Pioneer Association's ambitious project, "Second Coming of Solaris"...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me explain our job today.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Coming to the end of this chapter, the protagonist engaged in a showdown with the Crownless.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It goes: "...We compromised to the overwhelming darkness... Sword and spear, wand and gem, all had shattered like broken pieces..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "We stared at the night, almost covered by the rising Crownless... Its gaze pieced like a razor..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "...We cannot retreat, even wielding the Burning Jade as our only weapon..."

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "...March till the end if you're lost in the wild. Rip the moon apart if it fails to shine."

Options.PlotLineKey: I can't wait to see this in the game.
You should add grand music here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It marks the climax of the first chapter. I have the same exciting feeling as you. I wonder what it would be like in our game.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But with one issue remaining: What exactly is this Burning Jade?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though it appears in the previous chapters before, the writer has omitted the description of its shape and appearance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To reproduce the showdown, we're gonna need a reference for it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you happen to come across some samples, feel free to drop by.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. It matches the image of the Burning Jade in my head.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll deliver it to the dev team. They will need it for the last scene.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All chapters of Tiancheng have been completed.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Pioneer Association would like to thank you for your continued support, {PlayerName}.

Options.PlotLineKey: I love the design of the scenes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Same here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Same here. I'll let you know if we have any progress.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: By the way, Mr. Karl has heard stories about this. He would like to meet you if possible.

Options.PlotLineKey: I guess he's prepared a special gift for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mr. Karl also expressed his appreciation for your help in the game development.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't tell. You could ask him when you meet him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, our job is done here. But...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The references you brought in made our developers' lives much easier. They would like to come to you for more of this kind of favors. What would you say?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No worries. The Pioneer Association will pay you in full if you agree to help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, until we meet again, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you ask me, there is a clue you can get from one book fan.

Options.PlotLineKey: May I ask for a name?
Where is our book fan, then?

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: His name is Xieyang, often seen around the Jinzhou Institute during the daytime.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He has a reservoir of ideas for this book, generous in providing suggestions. But...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: His words are usually saddled with riddles.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, he is easy to get along with. But his words are usually saddled with riddles...

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We all can tell his passion for Second Coming of Solaris, but that doesn't make our conversations easier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, I have the feeling that you can understand him.

Options.PlotLineKey: Well, I happen to speak the language of these geeks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Though I'm not sure if Riddler is the right word, you seem pretty confident in this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Maqi
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then I'll entrust you to this.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Crownless's tyranny rules the failing moon...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...while civilization stems from the silent Burning Jade...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Finally! Someone reaches out to ask me, the most loyal fan of Second Coming of Solaris...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Only the expansive world in the book can match my incessant stream of creativity and overflowing talents for verses...

Options.PlotLineKey: What's this Burning Jade in your mind?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I know you'll come to me for this, from the moment you joined this project.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Because it's the key to turn the tide in the incredible final showdown!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A precious of such eminence will not tolerate any plain mold in this world.

Options.PlotLineKey: Then where can I find a reference?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Such nerve... Fine, I'll tell you. Only in the ever-changing Sonoro Sphere could you find a substantial copy of this Burning Jade.

Options.PlotLineKey: You really know a thing or two!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But it's a piece of cake for a No.1 book fan. I've prepared what you want.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, I can give this precious item to you, if you wish.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But with one condition.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I want you to ask Maqi to... add my name to the Special Thanks list.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How can I remain anonymous as the No.1 fan of this book?

Options.PlotLineKey: Only the Pioneer Association can decide.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just... do your best. Success only comes after you give it a go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xieyang
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here, have it. And don't forget your promise!
